**The AUP**

We do not allow

- BitTorrent
- TOR
- Public VPNs/Open Proxies
- MineCraft Servers

- Runescape Bots
- llegal activity (SPAM, Port Scanning, DoS, etc.)

We do allow

- Legal Adult
- Anything else legal in the US and not listed above.

**Can I get more _____?**
